quiz.spiegazione: Joyce was an Irish modernist writer famous for stream of consciousness.

quiz.domanda: The stream of consciousness technique was used by:
quiz.spiegazione: Stream of consciousness represents the flow of thoughts in characters' minds.

quiz.rispostaCorretta: Mrs Dalloway and To the Lighthouse
opzioni: Mrs Dalloway and To the Lighthouse
quiz.spiegazione: Woolf was a key figure of modernism and the Bloomsbury Group.
Orwell's works are famous for their critique of totalitarianism.
1984 warns against totalitarianism and surveillance.
'Big Brother is watching you' symbolizes total control.
Brave New World depicts a dystopia of pleasure and control.
The Great Gatsby captures the Jazz Age and the American Dream.

quiz.domanda: The Great Gatsby is set in:
quiz.spiegazione: The novel depicts the Roaring Twenties in America.

quiz.rispostaCorretta: The Old Man and the Sea and A Farewell to Arms
opzioni: The Old Man and the Sea and A Farewell to Arms
quiz.spiegazione: Hemingway won the Nobel Prize in 1954.

quiz.rispostaCorretta: Short sentences and simple words (iceberg theory)
opzioni: Short sentences and simple words (iceberg theory)
quiz.spiegazione: Hemingway's minimalist style hides deeper meanings.
Waiting for Godot is a masterpiece of the Theatre of the Absurd.

quiz.domanda: The Theatre of the Absurd explores:
quiz.spiegazione: Absurdist theatre questions the meaning of life.

quiz.domanda: The correct form of the third conditional is:
quiz.rispostaCorretta: If + past perfect, would have + past participle
opzioni: If + past perfect, would have + past participle
If + present perfect, will have + past participle
quiz.spiegazione: Third conditional: hypothetical past situations.

quiz.rispostaCorretta: If I had studied harder, I would have passed the exam
opzioni: If I had studied harder, I would have passed the exam
If I studied harder, I would pass the exam
If I study harder, I will pass the exam
If I would study harder, I passed the exam
quiz.spiegazione: Third conditional for unreal past situations.

quiz.domanda: The passive voice of 'They are building a new school' is:
quiz.rispostaCorretta: A new school is being built
opzioni: A new school is being built
A new school has been built
quiz.spiegazione: Present continuous passive: is/are being + past participle.

quiz.domanda: The reported speech of 'I will come tomorrow' is:
quiz.rispostaCorretta: He said he would come the next day
opzioni: He said he would come the next day
He said he will come tomorrow
quiz.spiegazione: Reported speech: will → would, tomorrow → the next day.

quiz.domanda: The correct relative pronoun in 'The man ___ car was stolen called the police' is:
quiz.spiegazione: 'Whose' indicates possession.

quiz.rispostaCorretta: Is essential to identify the noun
opzioni: Is essential to identify the noun
quiz.spiegazione: Defining clauses are necessary for meaning; no commas.

quiz.rispostaCorretta: Adds extra information and uses commas
opzioni: Adds extra information and uses commas
quiz.spiegazione: Non-defining clauses add extra, non-essential information.

quiz.rispostaCorretta: I wish I had more time
opzioni: I wish I had more time
I wish I have more time
I wish I will have more time
I wish I am having more time
quiz.spiegazione: 'Wish' + past simple for present unreal situations.

quiz.domanda: 'I wish I hadn't said that' expresses:
quiz.spiegazione: 'Wish' + past perfect for past regrets.

quiz.domanda: The difference between 'used to' and 'would' is:
quiz.rispostaCorretta: 'Used to' can describe states; 'would' only actions
opzioni: 'Used to' can describe states; 'would' only actions
quiz.spiegazione: 'I used to live there' (state); 'I would visit every summer' (action).

quiz.domanda: 'By the time I arrive, they will have left' uses:
quiz.spiegazione: Future perfect: will have + past participle.

quiz.domanda: The correct preposition is: 'I'm interested ___ learning English':
quiz.spiegazione: 'Interested in' is the correct collocation.

quiz.domanda: The correct preposition is: 'I'm good ___ mathematics':
quiz.spiegazione: 'Good at' is the correct collocation.

quiz.rispostaCorretta: A verb combined with a preposition or adverb
opzioni: A verb combined with a preposition or adverb
quiz.spiegazione: Phrasal verbs: look up, give up, turn on, etc.
'Give up' = stop doing something.
'I'm looking forward to meeting you' (not 'to meet').

quiz.rispostaCorretta: A hook, background, and thesis statement
opzioni: A hook, background, and thesis statement
quiz.spiegazione: A good introduction engages the reader and states the main argument.

quiz.rispostaCorretta: The main argument of an essay
opzioni: The main argument of an essay
quiz.spiegazione: The thesis states what you will argue or prove.

quiz.domanda: Linking words like 'however', 'moreover', 'therefore' are used to:
quiz.spiegazione: Linking words improve coherence and flow.
'However' introduces a contrasting idea.
'Moreover' adds information to support an argument.
'Therefore' introduces a logical conclusion.
Animal Farm (1945) is Orwell's allegorical novella about Stalinism.

quiz.domanda: The third conditional refers to real future situations.
quiz.spiegazione: The third conditional refers to unreal past situations.
Backshift: will → would in reported speech.
The Waste Land (1922) is a landmark of modernist poetry.
Lord of the Flies explores human nature and savagery.

quiz.domanda: Lord of the Flies is about:
quiz.rispostaCorretta: Boys stranded on an island who descend into savagery
opzioni: Boys stranded on an island who descend into savagery
quiz.spiegazione: The novel explores the darkness within human nature.
The Catcher in the Rye (1951) is a classic of teenage alienation.

quiz.domanda: Holden Caulfield is the protagonist of:
quiz.spiegazione: Holden is the iconic teenage narrator of Salinger's novel.
To Kill a Mockingbird (1960) addresses racial injustice in the American South.

quiz.domanda: Atticus Finch is a character in:
quiz.spiegazione: Atticus Finch is the moral hero who defends a Black man.
The Beats rejected mainstream American values in the 1950s.
On the Road (1957) is the defining novel of the Beat Generation.
Formal writing uses full forms and academic language.

quiz.domanda: The conclusion of an essay should:
quiz.rispostaCorretta: Summarize main points and restate the thesis
opzioni: Summarize main points and restate the thesis
quiz.spiegazione: A conclusion wraps up the argument without new information.
'In conclusion' introduces the final summary.

quiz.rispostaCorretta: The main idea of a paragraph
opzioni: The main idea of a paragraph
quiz.spiegazione: Each paragraph should have a clear topic sentence.

quiz.rispostaCorretta: Expressing the same idea in different words
opzioni: Expressing the same idea in different words
quiz.spiegazione: Paraphrasing shows understanding and avoids plagiarism.
